articles.title: President Xi Jinping warns Asia-Pacific must not 'relapse' into Cold War conflict, at APEC summit - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: China President Xi Jinping says Asia-Pacific countries should not “relapse” into Cold War-style confrontation and form “small circles” that exclude one another.
articles.content: China President Xi Jinping has told an APEC summit that Asia-Pacific countries should not relapse into Cold War-style confrontation and form small circles that exclude one another, in a clear rebuke … [+3826 chars]

articles.title: Duterte expected to tackle COVID-19 pandemic, climate change in APEC meet - CNN Philippines
articles.description: President Rodrigo Duterte is expected to push the country's stance on challenges brought by the COVID-19 pandemic and climate change when he attends the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation meeting slated this week.

articles.title: Lion at Singapore Zoo tests positive for Covid-19 - The Straits Times
articles.description: The African lion at Singapore Zoo tested positive after four Asiatic lions at Night Safari were found infected.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: SINGAPORE - The African lion at the Singapore Zoo which showed signs of sickness on Monday (Nov 8) has tested positive for Covid-19, said the Animal and Veterinary Service (AVS) on Wednesday evening.… [+1624 chars]

articles.title: Stocks end 6-day rally as investors take profits - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: THE PHILIPPINE stock market ended its six-day rally on Wednesday, in line with other Asian markets that declined after the Chinese government reported a spike in inflation in October.
articles.content:

articles.title: 4 lions at Night Safari test positive for COVID-19 after exposure to infected staff - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Four Asiatic lions at the Night Safari have tested positive for COVID-19 after being exposed to infected staff from Mandai Wildlife Group.

The lions had exhibited mild symptoms including coughing, sneezing and lethargy on Saturday (Nov 6), the A…
articles.content:
In response to questions from CNA, Mandai Wildlife Group said that three keepers from the Night Safari Carnivore section have tested positive for COVID-19.
